group.title: Group List
group.description: Group list items by common properties.
group.groupByDescription: Choose how to group the list items
group.groupByValueDescription: Group items that have the same value
group.groupByLengthDescription: Group items by their character length
group.groupByFirstCharDescription: Group items by their first character
group.groupByLastCharDescription: Group items by their last character

toolInfo.title: Group List
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to group list items by various criteria such as value, length, or character position. It's useful for organizing and categorizing data.

reverse.title: Reverse List
reverse.description: Reverse the order of items in a list.
reverse.reverseEachLineDescription: Reverse each line separately instead of the entire list

toolInfo.title: Reverse List
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to reverse the order of items in a list. You can reverse the entire list or each line separately.

sort.title: Sort List
sort.description: Sort list items in ascending or descending order.

toolInfo.title: Sort List
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to sort list items in various orders and types. You can sort alphabetically, numerically, or using natural sorting.

duplicate.title: Find Duplicates
duplicate.description: Find and remove duplicate items from a list.
duplicate.removeDuplicatesDescription: Remove duplicate items from the list

toolInfo.title: Find Duplicates
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to find and handle duplicate items in a list. You can remove duplicates or show only the duplicate items.

findUnique.title: Find Unique
findUnique.description: Find unique items in a list.

toolInfo.title: Find Unique
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to find unique items in a list. You can show unique items or duplicate items.

shuffle.title: Shuffle List
shuffle.description: Randomly shuffle the order of list items.
shuffle.shuffleEachLineDescription: Shuffle each line separately instead of the entire list

toolInfo.title: Shuffle List
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to randomly shuffle the order of items in a list. You can shuffle the entire list or each line separately.

wrap.title: Wrap List
wrap.description: Add text before and after each list item.
wrap.joinSeparatorDescription: Separator to join the wrapped list
wrap.leftTextDescription: Text to add before each item
wrap.rightTextDescription: Text to add after each item

toolInfo.title: List Wrapping
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to add text before and after each item in a list. You can specify different text for the left and right sides, and control how the list is processed. It's useful for adding quotes, brackets, or other formatting to list items, preparing data for different formats, or creating structured text.
